originalTitle: Gunmen kill dozens in Nigeria as US military deployment confirmed
title: Gunmen kill dozens in Nigeria as US military deployment confirmed
content: Nigeria's government says a jihadist group massacred local Muslims who refused to join them.

originalTitle: Zimbabwe's Mugabe latest former African leader to be mentioned in Epstein files
title: Zimbabwe's Mugabe latest former African leader to be mentioned in Epstein files
content: Epstein considered approaching Mugabe about a new currency in 2015 - the latest batch of files show.

originalTitle: Leader of South Africa's second largest party to step down
title: Leader of South Africa's second largest party to step down
content: The surprise move may threaten the stability of the coalition government of which the DA is a key partner.

originalTitle: In Pakistan, gold price rollercoaster pushes buyers to silver
title: In Pakistan, gold price rollercoaster pushes buyers to silver
content: With gold prices sky-rocketing, Pakistanis are turning to buying silver to cash in on some of the bullion rush.

originalTitle: Pakistan army says it killed 216 fighters in weeklong Balochistan campaign
title: Pakistan army says it killed 216 fighters in weeklong Balochistan campaign
content: Military says operations that began in January degraded leadership and operational capabilities of 'terrorist' networks.

originalTitle: Video: US news host Savannah Guthrie pleads for return of abducted mother
title: Video: US news host Savannah Guthrie pleads for return of abducted mother
content: US news anchor Savannah Guthrie posted a video on social media making an emotional appeal for the return of her mother.

originalTitle: US must be prudent when supplying arms to Taiwan, Xi tells Trump
title: US must be prudent when supplying arms to Taiwan, Xi tells Trump
content: Their call comes in the wake of a flurry of visits by Western leaders to China in recent months.

originalTitle: Naked images remained in Epstein files despite outcry
title: Naked images remained in Epstein files despite outcry
content: Four images seen by BBC Verify show partially clothed women with their faces and bodies unredacted.

originalTitle: 'We are ready to talk': US news anchor Savannah Guthrie pleads for return of her abducted mother
title: 'We are ready to talk': US news anchor Savannah Guthrie pleads for return of her abducted mother
content: "She is without any medicine. She needs it to survive," says the NBC host about missing 84-year-old Nancy Guthrie.

originalTitle: 'Pure logic' Guehi should play in final - Guardiola seeks rule change
title: 'Pure logic' Guehi should play in final - Guardiola seeks rule change
content: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola wants the English Football League to change their rules to allow Marc Guehi to play in the Carabao Cup final against Arsenal.

originalTitle: More questions than answers in challenging Newcastle season
title: More questions than answers in challenging Newcastle season
content: Holders Newcastle United were knocked out of the Carabao Cup by Manchester City on Wednesday night and a challenging season shows no sign of relenting.

originalTitle: Is Spurs' Moore the answer to Rangers' open-play issues?
title: Is Spurs' Moore the answer to Rangers' open-play issues?
content: Consistency is the next step for Rangers winger Mikey Moore after a standout performance against Kilmarnock, says head coach Danny Rohl.
